properties.description: Creating HR_Personnel_Sub_Area view for PBI Reports

source:
from notebookutils import mssparkutils
from pyspark.sql import SparkSession
spark = SparkSession.builder.getOrCreate()

# Builds the calendar which holds the CY and FY info
# mssparkutils.notebook.run('/Calendar')

%%sql

CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW vw_mipins_hr_fact_sickness_union

AS

      SELECT DISTINCT

      abs.EmployeeID AS StaffNumber,
      date.financial_year AS MeasureYear,
      COUNT(*) as SicknessCount


      FROM odw_harmonised_db.hr_absence_dim abs
      FULL JOIN default.calendar_dim_plus date on date.calendarDate = abs.AbsenceEndDate
      WHERE AbsenceType in  ('Sickness') and financial_year in ('CurrentFY','PreviousFY')
      GROUP BY EmployeeID
            ,financial_year


      UNION

      SELECT DISTINCT

      abs.EmployeeID,
      date.calendar_year,
      COUNT(*) as SicknessCount


      FROM odw_harmonised_db.hr_absence_dim abs
      FULL JOIN default.calendar_dim_plus date on date.calendarDate = abs.AbsenceEndDate
      WHERE AbsenceType in  ('Sickness') and calendar_year in ('CurrentCY','PreviousCY')
      GROUP BY EmployeeID
            ,calendar_year

%%sql

CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW odw_curated_db.vw_mipins_hr_fact_sickness

AS

SELECT * FROM vw_mipins_hr_fact_sickness_union
PIVOT
(
      MAX(SicknessCount)
      FOR MeasureYear IN ('PreviousFY','CurrentFY','PreviousCY','CurrentCY')
) order by StaffNumber

%%sql

create or replace table odw_curated_db.mipins_hr_fact_sickness
using delta
as
SELECT * FROM odw_curated_db.vw_mipins_hr_fact_sickness
